slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Dragon Tiger Wild comes with the latest WILD CARD bonus! Get a bigger chance to win up to 127x!
You just need to guess the highest card and the wild card for even bigger prizes! LET'S GET WILD!!!

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: This game is played with 3 cards. The 2 main cards (Dragon and Tiger) will compete to see which side has the highest value. 1 wild card is drawn to form a Wild Bonus combination.
You can bet on the Main Bets: Dragon/Tiger, or on Wild Bet combinations: Dragon Wild, Dragon Pair, or Tiger Wild, Tiger Pair, and Super Wild.

slide-3.title: Wild Bonus
content: The wild card appears to create bonus combinations that can drastically increase your winnings up to 127x!
Place your bets on wild combinations and seize the chance for multiple WILD BONUS payouts!
